message.content: First, we need to identify a store where we can buy furniture. One such popular store is IKEA, which sells furniture as well as other household items. If we consider a grocery store like Walmart or Target, they sell furniture, but typically do not have a cafeteria or restaurant within the store where they serve meatballs. However, some grocery stores may have a frozen food section where they sell pre-packaged meatballs, which would still technically mean you can buy both furniture and meatballs in the same store.
